name: Peggy's Puzzling Poltergeists
description:
Made for Ebeth's Short and Sweet jam at itch.io, Peggy's Puzzling Poltergeists is made on a whimsical aesthetic based upon the anatomy of cute.  Peggy's ghostly pal, Boo can't get back to his haunting grounds because mean, nasty poltergeists are picking on him.  Boo's haunting grounds are deep within a mysterious temple near where Peggy lives.  In order to get Boo back to it, she's going to have navigate the puzzles of ruins while dodging those mean old poltergeists who'd like nothing more than have Peggy keep them company for all eternity.

Made in VX Ace with original graphics, Peggy is my first serious attempt at a puzzle game.
